page.title: 14BURRINGTON SOCIETIES
page.content: {BURRINGTON WOMEN's INSTITUTE,}one of the National Federation of W.I.'s, has 28 members and meets monthly in the {PARISH HALL.}Its programme sets out to fulfil the aims of the movement "to improve the quality of rural life" by providing demonstrations of cookery and craft, talks on subjects of general interest, outings and friendly competition in sport,cookery & crafts. It marked its 60th. birthday in 1985 with supper, an exhibition entitled "farmhouse kitchen 1925-1985" and a display of fashions through the Decades, modelled by members. {BURRINGTON BADMINTON CLUB}meets weekly in the{PARISH HALL}on winter evenings. This game is played by members from age 12 upwards. It provides social and sporting interest for those unable to travel further afield for more competitive play in local leagues.
